page.title: 14ASLACKBY-EMPLOYMENT
page.content: are self-employed business men too: Painter and Decorator, Signwriter, Joiner and Builder and a Furniture Restorer. As a farming village, you would expect to see everyday signs of agriculture all the time. There are two farmers in Aslackby. One deals mainly in sheep while the other, in vegetation. Aslackby has a Post Office which sells confectionary and cigarettes, as well as serving as a newsagents. There is also a bakery which unfortunately does not bake or sell its own bread, but the facilities are still there. The store supplies a bakery round, for Aslackby and other surrounding villages. It sells canned foods,bread,confectionary and various other everyday, household goods. A butcher travels from Billingborough
